markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overwhelming Spellstrike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2876) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 48 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

**Requirements**
Your Spellstrike is charged.

</column>

---

You pierce through your foe's resistance. Make a Spellstrike. The spell you cast as part of the Spellstrike ignores an amount of the target's resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell. A creature's immunities are unaffected.
name: Overwhelming Spellstrike

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Overwhelming Spellstrike Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 48 2.0 Prerequisites Spellstrike Requirements Your Spellstrike is charged. --- You pierce through your foe's resistance. Make a Spellstrike. The spell you cast as part of the Spellstrike ignores an amount of the target's resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including persistent damage and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell. A creature's immunities are unaffected.
